Command: music

Finds music-related info like similar artists, releases, or labels.

Alias: m

Arguments: <method>, <query>

Permission: user

Notes:
Method query types:

  • similiar: artist name
  • release: release name
  • artist: artist name
  • label: label name
  • random: does as only method currently not need a query

Examples:

?music similiar, ugly heroes
?music release, kopfnicker
?music artist, wu-tang
?music label, n5md
?music random
--- aliased ---
?m similiar, ugly heroes
?m release, kopfnicker
?m artist, wu-tang
?m label, n5md
?m random
